review:
The movie was good in fact Nitesh Tiwari tries some awesome elements. Comic timing, acting by all actors,storyline, screenplay was good. But the problem is last few minutes were very slow and over dramatic. But still a good movie to watch.
Ratings:7.7/10

''Bhootnaath'' 2014 is a very nice movie it's a sequel to the first part of the movie ''Bhootnath'' 2008. The storyline is very nice its quite entertaining. It makes people understand what is the value of their vote. 7.2/10 from my side.
